name: Freedom (itch) (Yamin Shihab)
description:
Movement:  WASD, arrow keys and space

So I'm pretty new to game development and it's summer break at school, so I decided to join this game jam to release my first game. I wasn't really able to think of a good idea to go with the theme so I just made it so that you have to escape from a platformer level (lame). The game isn't that good, there are only four levels, it's a mess of code and there isn't that much to it so I'll probably keep updating it after the jam.

Engine: Godot

Art: Pixelorama

Sound: Chiptone

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure
